summary: REQ-37 and REQ-38 appear to be implemented: the diff indicates Brain Dump clearing is hardened to only affect Brain Dump storage keys and Brain Dump UI helper text was added/adjusted to clarify backlog tasks remain. The diff also includes additional Brain Dump-related UI/behavior changes not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded Brain Dump speech-to-text functionality (listening state, transcript append, resetTranscript, mic icons) beyond the requested backlog persistence + helper text change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to ensure clearing Brain Dump does not affect backlog tasks and to add helper copy near clear action; speech-to-text is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded Brain Dump item category override tracking and reclassification behavior when editing item text (categoryOverridden, suggested vs selectedCategory, error fallback logic).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-37/REQ-38; these relate to categorization/editing behavior rather than clearing behavior or helper text.
